other_tests.findings: Initially normal EEG, later diffusely abnormal EEG.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Improved EEG by mid-January, reaching normal range by discharge.

other_tests.findings: Elevated tricyclic antidepressant plasma level (imipramine plus desipramine = 540 ng/ml).
Dramatic response midway through a course of six treatments, with loss of psychotic symptomatology.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Subsequent re-agitation and required another short course of ECT.

other_tests.findings: Oral administration of lithium was unreliable, and serum lithium levels could not be obtained initially.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Patient became symptom-free after consistent lithium therapy following ECT.
